verses.verse: And Moses <WH4872> with the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> commanded <WH6680> the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> Keep <WH8104> all <WH3605> the commandments <WH4687> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you this day. <WH3117>

And it shall be on the day <WH3117> when <WH834> you shall pass <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383> to the land <WH776> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you, that you shall set <WH6965> you up great <WH1419> stones, <WH68> and plaster <WH7874> them with plaster: <WH7875>

And you shall write <WH3789> on them all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> law, <WH8451> when you are passed <WH5674> over, <WH5674> that you may go <WH935> in to the land <WH776> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you, a land <WH776> that flows <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey; <WH1706> as the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of your fathers <WH1> has promised <WH1696> you.

Therefore it shall be when you be gone <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan, <WH3383> that you shall set <WH6965> up these <WH428> stones, <WH68> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you this day, <WH3117> in mount <WH2022> Ebal, <WH5858> and you shall plaster <WH7874> them with plaster. <WH7875>
And there <WH8033> shall you build <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> to the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> an altar <WH4196> of stones: <WH68> you shall not lift <WH5130> up any iron <WH1270> tool on them.

You shall build <WH1129> the altar <WH4196> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> of whole <WH8003> stones: <WH68> and you shall offer <WH5927> burnt <WH5930> offerings thereon <WH5921> to the LORD <WH3068> your God: <WH430>
And you shall offer <WH2076> peace <WH8002> offerings, and shall eat <WH398> there, <WH8033> and rejoice <WH8055> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
And you shall write <WH3789> on the stones <WH68> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> law <WH8451> very <WH3190> plainly. <WH874>

And Moses <WH4872> and the priests <WH3548> the Levites <WH3881> spoke <WH1696> to all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> Take <WH5535> heed, <WH5535> and listen, <WH8085> O Israel; <WH3478> this <WH2088> day <WH3117> you are become <WH1961> the people <WH5971> of the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

You shall therefore obey <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and do <WH6213> his commandments <WH4687> and his statutes, <WH2706> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you this day. <WH3117>
And Moses <WH4872> charged <WH6680> the people <WH5971> the same <WH1931> day, <WH3117> saying, <WH559>

These <WH428> shall stand <WH5975> on mount <WH2022> Gerizim <WH1630> to bless <WH1288> the people, <WH5971> when you are come <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan; <WH3383> Simeon, <WH8095> and Levi, <WH3878> and Judah, <WH3063> and Issachar, <WH3485> and Joseph, <WH3130> and Benjamin: <WH1144>
And these <WH428> shall stand <WH5975> on mount <WH2022> Ebal <WH5858> to curse; <WH7045> Reuben, <WH7205> Gad, <WH1410> and Asher, <WH836> and Zebulun, <WH2074> Dan, <WH1835> and Naphtali. <WH5321>
And the Levites <WH3881> shall speak, <WH6030> and say <WH559> to all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> with a loud <WH7311> voice, <WH6963>

Cursed <WH779> be the man <WH376> that makes <WH6213> any graven <WH6459> or molten <WH4541> image, an abomination <WH8441> to the LORD, <WH3068> the work <WH4639> of the hands <WH3027> of the craftsman, <WH2796> and puts <WH7760> it in a secret <WH5643> place. And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall answer <WH6030> and say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that sets <WH7034> light <WH7034> by his father <WH1> or his mother. <WH517> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that removes <WH5253> his neighbor's <WH7453> landmark. <WH1366> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that makes the blind <WH5787> to wander <WH7686> out of the way. <WH1870> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>

Cursed <WH779> be he that perverts <WH5186> the judgment <WH4941> of the stranger, <WH1616> fatherless, <WH3490> and widow. <WH490> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>

Cursed <WH779> be he that lies <WH7901> with his father's <WH1> wife; <WH802> because <WH3588> he uncovers <WH1540> his father's <WH1> skirt. <WH3671> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that lies <WH7901> with any <WH3605> manner of beast. <WH929> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>

Cursed <WH779> be he that lies <WH7901> with his sister, <WH269> the daughter <WH1323> of his father, <WH1> or <WH176> the daughter <WH1323> of his mother. <WH517> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that lies <WH7901> with his mother <WH2859> in law. <WH2859> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that smites <WH5221> his neighbor <WH7453> secretly. <WH5643> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that takes <WH3947> reward <WH7810> to slay <WH5221> an innocent <WH5355> person. <WH5315> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that confirms <WH6965> not all the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> law <WH8451> to do <WH6213> them. And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543>
